comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
Never mind the date! - what about the time?

Left hand clock says 10:40.  Right hand clock says 10:36.

Or is it a trick-of-the-eye due to parallax error?

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: It could be a trick of the eye...like being a passenger in a car and thinking the driver is speeding! I wonder how these clocks are set - as one or individually? In which case one could be slow.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: From comments by our readers at the Archives Outside blog we have dated this image c.1904.
